DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective protocol determine administration mini-dose glucagon administer subcutaneously exercise produce good glucose stability adjustment moderate intensity exercise patient Type 1 Diabetes ( T1D ) . It also assess whether mini-dose glucagon exercise produce good glucose stability basal insulin reduction extra carbohydrate consumption . This randomized , 4-way crossover trial . The trial include 16 participant complete study . Each participant undergo four aerobic exercise session ( random order ) , different strategy glucose regulation : - Control Trial : Fasted exercise , basal insulin reduction - Strategy 1 : Fasted exercise , basal insulin reduction ( 50 % reduction basal rate 60 minute exercise , duration exercise ) - Strategy 2 : Fasted exercise , basal adjustment + pre-exercise glucose tab ( buccal route-40 gram total ) - Strategy 3 : Fasted exercise , basal adjustment + pre-exercise mini-dose glucagon ( sc ) In 4 session , aerobic exercise perform fasted state ( standardized meal ) 45 minuet ~50-55 % participant 's per-determined aerobic capacity . The participant 's pump blind control trial , strategy 1 , strategy 3 injection saline give control trial strategy 1 participant blind strategy . The primary outcome study glycemic response exercise early recovery .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Clinical diagnosis presume autoimmune type 1 diabetes , receive daily insulin 2 . Age 18 < 65 year 3 . Duration T1D ≥ 2 year 4 . Random Cpeptide < 0.6 ng/ml 5 . Using continuous subcutaneous insulin infusion ( CSII ; insulin pump ) least 6 month , plan discontinue pump use study 6 . Exercises regularly , i.e . ≥30 minute moderate vigorous aerobic activity X ≥3 times/week 7 . Body mass index ( BMI ) < 30 kg/m2 8 . Females must meet one follow criterion : Of childbearing potential currently pregnant lactating , agree use accepted contraceptive regimen describe study procedure manual throughout entire duration study ; Of nonchildbearing potential , defined female hysterectomy tubal ligation , clinically consider infertile menopausal state ( least 1 year without menses ) 9 . In good general health condition could influence outcome trial , judgment investigator good candidate study base review available medical history , physical examination clinical laboratory evaluation 10 . Willing adhere protocol requirement duration study 11 . Must enrol T1D Exchange clinic registry willing join registry 1 . One severe hypoglycemic episode past 12 month ( defined episode require third party assistance treatment ) 2 . Active diabetic retinopathy ( proliferative diabetic retinopathy vitreous hemorrhage past 6 month ) could potentially worsen exercise protocol 3 . Peripheral neuropathy insensate foot 4 . Cardiovascular autonomic neuropathy inappropriate heart rate response exercise 5 . Use noninsulin antidiabetic medication 6 . Use betablockers 7 . Use agent affect hepatic glucose production beta adrenergic agonist , xanthine derivative 8 . Use Pramlintide 9 . Currently follow low calorie weightloss diet 10 .
